prompts: A set of colorful paper envelopes with intricate designs.
A compact stapler accompanied by a pair of scissors and a small roll of adhesive tape, neatly arranged next to each other.
A small collection of hair accessories including assorted hair ties, bobby pins, and a vintage comb.
A neat row of travel-size cosmetic items, such as a mini perfume bottle and a makeup brush.
A compact set of household tools including a mini screwdriver and a measuring tape, neatly organized in a box.
A delicate arrangement of vintage postcards and letters, some partially folded and others spread out.
Add a tube of hand cream.
Add a tiny photo album and a miniature compass.
A small jar of spice and a measuring spoon.
A neatly organized set of a leather-bound journal and a ink bottle.
Add a small bottle of hand sanitizer and a wash cloth.
A collection of small musical items like a harmonica, a set of guitar picks, and a mini metronome.
A tidy arrangement of sports accessories, featuring a pair of sweatbands, a rolled-up headband, and a mini foam roller.
A heart carved out of wood.
A small box that is packed as a gift.
